item.title: Switching from pc to mac
item.description: I’m a developer in the Microsoft ecosystem but I prefer Apple hardware, and since Microsoft introduced .NET 5 it is easy to work on your project using a mac. This post shall describe you my experience regarding the switch from pc to mac, while the rest of the development team is working with a pc.
